text: Xìndào de rénmen a! Yǒurén zài huìchǎng zhōng duì nǐmen shuō:`Qǐng nǐmen tuìràng yīdiǎn ba!'Nǐmen jiù yīngdāng tuìràng xiē, zhēnzhǔ jiàng shǐ nǐmen kuānyù. Yǒurén duì nǐmen shuō:`Nǐmen qǐlái ba!'Nǐmen jiù yīngdāng qǐlái, zhēnzhǔ jiàng nǐmen zhōng de xìndào zhě shēngjí, bìng jiāng nǐmen zhōng yǒu xuéwèn de rénmen tíshēng ruògān jí. Zhēnzhǔ shì chè zhī nǐmen de xíngwéi de.
